definition: دوام dawām duration, continuance, permanence, perpetuity; uninterrupted succession; endurance, perseverance; abiding, stay (of s.o., في at a place); دواما dawāman and على الدوام permanently, perpetually, at all times, ever, always │ وقت الدوام, اوقات الدوام, ساعات الدوام working hours, office hours (Ir., Syr.)
